projects.title: NexFit
projects.description: Fitness platform developed with microservice architecture. User management, exercise programming, and payment system integrations.
projects.overview: NexFit is a comprehensive fitness platform built with modern microservice architecture. The system provides scalable solutions for fitness centers and personal trainers.

projects.title: Atlas AI
projects.description: Fully local, security-focused AI assistant. Privacy-preserving, customizable AI solution that protects user data.
projects.overview: Atlas AI is a privacy-focused artificial intelligence assistant that runs completely locally on your device, ensuring your data never leaves your machine.

projects.title: NexPanel
projects.description: Customizable modular management system with multi-tenant panel architecture. Scalable infrastructure for SaaS products.
projects.overview: NexPanel is a modular SaaS management system that provides customizable admin panels for different client needs with multi-tenant architecture.

projects.title: NexCV & NexBook
projects.description: AI-powered CV builder and appointment management system. Customer-focused solutions with SaaS model.
projects.overview: NexCV & NexBook combines AI-powered CV creation with intelligent appointment management, providing integrated business solutions.
